Title: Half Streamflow
Description: Half the amount of streamflow going to the Great Salt Lake

Title: Double Streamflow
Description: Double the amount of streamflow going towards the Great Salt Lake before humans

Title: No humans
Description: Sets consumptive water use to zero

Title: Less humans
Description: Sets consumptive water use to zero

Title: Double the Rain
Description: Doubles the amount of rain falling directly on the lake

Title: Double the Water Consumption
Description: Doubles the amount of water people use
